Subject: Shadow Cat and Snow Tech, Crispy or tender?
Date: Wed, 20 Dec 2000 14:29:26 -0800
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
Message-ID: <F53eLnuIPv4C9yloFi0000047db@...>

* Shadow Cat looked up at Dark Lavatron. Her suprise evedent on her face.*

" How'd they do THAT!"

* She whipped her head around to Snow Tech who looks just as dunb-founded as 
she. Snow Tech finally looks at Shadow Cat, and speaks what she was 
thinking.*

" Holy S&*^! That thing is HUGE!"

* They both whip their heads around to the sound of it's voice and the 
rummbling of its approach. They both saw the barrage of missles raining down 
at them.*

" SCATTER"

* SHadow Cat leaps to the air, using her wings and supersonic speed to dodge 
the missles that fell down past her like large, dangerous drops of rain. 
Snow Tech was not so lucky, he could not fly yet, so had to dodge them on 
the ground. He squeeled and ran around the large exsplosions and craters 
that appeared arund him.*

"Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeek!!"

* Shadow Cat flew up into the clouds, gathering energy as she went. Once in 
the safe cover of the clouds, she extended her pent up energy into the 
clouds, calling her favorite element. Lightning. The energy of the sky came 
rumbling at her call, balling up above her up-raised hands. It gathered 
until it was the size of a large building. She knew that some of it wouldn't 
hit the large Predacon, but some of it had too, and hopefully it would give 
Snow Tech enough time to get away. But she was taking a risk, she didn't 
know if it would affect the large Pred. She had never done it to one. Heck, 
she hadn't done it to one of her own kind period! She had only used it on 
her prison guards.She arched her back, getting ready to fire. She closed her 
eyes and prayed that it would work.*

" LIGHTNING STORM!!!!"

Electric energy rained down on her enemy, falling every-where, she could 
only approximately aim this big of a bolt at something that small. If she 
was trying to hit a mountain, she would for shure hit it. But this was 
risky.*

* Snow Tech squeeled again as a bolt of lightning struck his tail and butt. 
The electric energy almost short surcuiting him. God! She could'a warned 
him!!!*

>::Dark Lavatron::
>
>Astral fires two missiles as he dives under several shots, taking out
>one of the two EMPs which were still functional. He spins around to
>see several bots arrive at battle.
>
>Astral smiles. New targets..
>
>"Lavacons, UNITE!" he yells out. Fenox, Starlight, Griplash, and
>Recklessa all transform into various body-parts. Shots whizz past
>them as they combine, forming the giant Dark Lavatron.
>
>Dark Lavatron laughs. "Feel my wrath, Maximal!" He yells out in a
>deep voice, stomping toward Snow Tech and Shadow Cat and firing
>missiles down at them. A missile hits the ground, flames rushing
>across the grassland. The ground shakes as his feet make large
>imprints in it.
>
>
>
